shows.title: Stranger Things
shows.overview: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces and one strange little girl.

shows.title: What We Do in the Shadows
shows.overview: Based on the feature film of the same name from Jemaine Clement and Taika Waititi, “What We Do in the Shadows” is a documentary-style look into the daily (or rather, nightly) lives of four vampires who’ve “lived” together for hundreds of years in Staten Island. After an unexpected visit from their dark lord and leader, the vampires are reminded of what they were initially tasked with upon their arrival in New York over a century ago – total and complete domination of the New World. But what exactly is the best way to go about achieving said domination? The vérité camera crew follows along as the vampires set out to answer this query.
shows.originalTitle: What We Do in the Shadows

shows.title: The Haunting of Hill House
shows.overview: Flashing between past and present, a fractured family confronts haunting memories of their old home and the terrifying events that drove them from it.

shows.title: The Originals
shows.overview: This thrilling spinoff from The Vampire Diaries centres on the Original Family – power-hungry thousand-year-old vampires Elijah, Rebekah and vampire/werewolf hybrid Klaus - who look to take back New Orleans after being exiled a century ago.

shows.title: Supernatural
shows.overview: When they were boys, Sam and Dean Winchester lost their mother to a mysterious and demonic supernatural force. Now, the Winchester brothers crisscross the country battling every kind of supernatural threat they encounter along the way.

shows.title: Kingdom
shows.overview: While strange rumors about their ill king grip a kingdom, the crown prince becomes their only hope against a mysterious plague overtaking the land.

shows.title: American Horror Story
shows.overview: American Horror Story revolves around The Harmons, a family of three who moved from Boston to Los Angeles as a means to reconcile past anguish. From executive producers Ryan Murphy and Brad Falchuk (Nip Tuck) and Dante Di Loreto (Temple Grandin).

shows.title: The Walking Dead
shows.overview: County Sheriff Rick Grimes, his wife, son and a small eclectic group try to survive constant attacks from zombies and other threats.

shows.title: The Fall of the House of Usher
shows.overview: To secure their fortune — and future — two ruthless siblings build a family dynasty that begins to crumble when their heirs mysteriously die, one by one.
shows.originalTitle: The Fall of the House of Usher

shows.title: Paranormal
shows.overview: After a skeptical hematologist is plunged into a series of inexplicable events, he unwillingly becomes the go-to-guy for paranormal investigations.

shows.title: The Sandman
shows.overview: After years of imprisonment, Morpheus — the King of Dreams — embarks on a journey across worlds to find what was stolen from him and restore his power.

shows.title: The Vampire Diaries
shows.overview: Acclaimed by critics and fans alike, The Vampire Diaries is the story of two vampire brothers obsessed with the same beautiful girl in a small town where supernatural beings live in secret amongst its residents.

shows.title: Yellowjackets
shows.overview: Wildly talented high school girls' soccer players descend into savage clans after their plane crashes in the remote northern wilderness. Twenty-five years later, they discover that what began in the wild is far from over.

shows.title: Santa Clarita Diet
shows.overview: A married realtor and mother to a teenager undergoes a dramatic change that propels her down a road of death and destruction, but leaves her looking and feeling better than ever.

shows.title: Midnight Mass
shows.overview: Actors from Mike Flanagan's "The Haunting of Hill House" and "The Haunting of Bly Manor" reunite for this eerie ensemble drama set on a remote island.

shows.title: The Exorcist
shows.overview: A family gets entangled with the Catholic Church when it suspects a demonic presence in its home.

shows.title: Chilling Adventures of Sabrina
shows.overview: Magic and mischief collide as half-human, half-witch Sabrina navigates between two worlds: mortal teen life and her family's legacy, the Church of Night.

shows.title: Sweet Home
shows.overview: As humans turn into savage monsters and the world plunges into terror, a handful of survivors fight for their lives — and to hold on to their humanity.

shows.title: Them
shows.overview: THEM is a limited anthology series that explores terror in America. The first season, 1950s-set COVENANT centers around a Black family who move from North Carolina to an all-white Los Angeles neighborhood during the period known as The Great Migration. The family’s idyllic home becomes ground zero where malevolent forces, next door and otherworldly, threaten to taunt, ravage and destroy them.

shows.title: Servant
shows.overview: From M. Night Shyamalan, Servant follows a Philadelphia couple in mourning after an unspeakable tragedy creates a rift in their marriage and opens the door for a mysterious force to enter their home.
